final_content: OMG! Apple AI is getting so many updates! 🚀
And Memory Movies on Mac?! Describe & done? 🎬
EU gets it now too! 🇪🇺🌍 More languages added!
Vision Pro integration?! Woah, fancy stuff. 🤩
New emojis! A root vegatable?! What?! 🥕😂
Recipe companion in News+?! I'm so ready! 🍳
iOS 18.4 is bringing all the goodies. 🎉
